about.hero_title_2: Innovation and quality Made in Italy in hydromassage systems since 2004.
about.first_section_title_2: A story of innovation and Italian ingenuity in the wellness sector
about.first_section_1: SACITH began operations in 2004, focusing on the production of high-tech components for air hydromassage systems. It quickly became the leading supplier of air system components for the most important Italian hydromassage tub brands, thanks in part to the acquisition of the molds and patents of another leading company specializing in hydromassage component development.
about.first_section_2: In 2006, it created and developed Sacitronic, successfully meeting the challenge of developing an electromechanical control system for pumps, covered by an international patent.
about.second_section_title_2: The first rectangular shower tray drains
about.second_section: In 2015, the company entered the shower drain and waste sector, launching a highly innovative project: the first rectangular shower tray drain. The product was an immediate success, leading the company to later introduce more traditional round drains with a 90 mm diameter hole into its catalog.
about.fourth_section_title_2: Introducing the Moon series: the future of modular hydromassage
about.fourth_section: In 2024, a completely new range of hydromassage products was introduced, groundbreaking in its extreme modularity, customization, and customer-enabled after-sales maintenance: the Moon series.
about.third_section_title_2: SACITH: constant innovation for a smarter future
about.third_section_1: SACITH srl has positioned itself on the market as a company capable of innovating at every stage of its evolutionary journey, making this the cornerstone of its businessâ€”and it continues to do so today.
about.third_section_2: Stay updated on upcoming news on our website and on our social media channels.

product-list.title: DISCOVER ALL PRODUCT CATEGORIES
product-list.description_1: Whirlpool and wellness components, designed with the highest quality materials, 100% Made in Italy. Each of our components is engineered to last, without compromising performance and reliability. Our offering includes nozzles, air jets, microjets, blowers, fittings, and much more. Our catalog offers everything you need to create a kit for your bath tubs.
product-list.description_2: SACITH's latest major project in the world of hydromassage and wellness features a completely redesigned nozzle, air jets, and microjets that meet the aesthetic needs of the market. The entire range also features LED lighting.
product-list.contact_subtitle: Not sure which category is right for you?
product-list.contact_description: Contact us for a free consultation or download our complete catalog in PDF.
product-list.about_title: Our daily work is to offer you only the best.
product-list.about_excelence_description: Every product is conceived and fully manufactured in Italy. The selection of high-quality and durable materials ensures long-lasting reliability and certified quality.
product-list.about_research_description: We constantly invest in new technologies to provide modern, sustainable, and aesthetically refined solutions, enhancing every user experience.
product-list.about_passion_description: With over 50 years of history, we provide professionalism and specialization at every stage of the process: from idea to design, up to final production.

faq_whirlpool.question: What finishes are available for exposed versions?
faq_whirlpool.answer: Our entire catalog offers chrome and white versions. The new white versions feature an ASA white finish, which prevents yellowing and aging over time.

faq_whirlpool.question: How can I order products to ensure they meet my needs?
faq_whirlpool.answer: To configure custom kits or request modifications and updates to the hydromassage and wellness features, please contact info@sacith.com or the R&D department at alessandro.stocchero@sacith.com to receive the necessary information as soon as possible.

faq_whirlpool.question: Something new?
faq_whirlpool.answer: Always at SACITH! Click on the "NEW!" banner at the top of the page or explore the catalog in the "Products" section.

faq_drains.question: Do shower drains comply with the EN 274 standard?
faq_drains.answer: The majority of our shower drains comply with the current EN 274 standard.

faq_drains.question: How many liters per minute (l/min) do the products in the catalog drain?
faq_drains.answer: From the standard round version to the rectangular shower drains, our catalog offers a range between 24 and 38 l/min.

faq_drains.question: Are they reliable and long-lasting?
faq_drains.answer: Many customers, including leading names in the plumbing and sanitary ware world, rely on SACITH shower drains because they know they're getting impeccable products in terms of technology, performance, and durability.

faq_drains.question: What if I need help?
faq_drains.answer: No problem! For any questions, please contact our R&D team at alessandro.stocchero@sacith.com and we'll get back to you as quickly as possible! Our customers have always been satisfied.

faq_drains.question: Something new?
faq_drains.answer: Always at SACITH! Click on the "NEW!" banner at the top of the page or explore the catalog in the "Products" section.
